title: Graph the First Inequality
text: We must graph $$x+y \leq 2$$, which rearranges to $$y \leq 2-x$$. We make the line solid and shade below it since we have $$ \leq $$.\n##figure2.gif##

title: Graph the Second Inequality
text: We must graph $$y \geq \frac{2}{3} x-1$$. We make the line solid and shade above it since we have >.\n##figure4.gif##

title: The solution is region where shading overlaps: Blue-red
